fullstack-web.summary: Full Stack web developer with more than 5 years of experience developing small and medium scale web projects. Specialized in MERN stack with more than 4 years of experience working with ReactJS and relational and non-relational databases. Expert in Test Driven Development and agile methodologies. I aspire to be part of a multidisciplinary team where I have to push my reasoning and programming skills to the maximum. I am not afraid to learn new technologies or adapt to different environments and work methodologies. My biggest goal in life is to work and grow with professionals who are dedicated in their career.

titles.title: Bachelor of Science: Computer Science
titles.description: Degree Thesis on creation of a consensus algorithm capable of guaranteeing the security and traceability of Bitcoin Protocol without the use of Proof of Work, focused on solving centralisation, scalability and environmental problems. The result was praised by the thesis tribunal obtaining the maximum qualification.

experience.title: Software Developer
details: Develop PoC for Security Tokens integration with DEXs like Uniswap.
Design and develop micobo DApp wallet.
Support Frontend team in DApp development.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer - Part Time
experience.description: Senior Full Stack engineer in charge of the architecture design and tech stack of the platform.
details: Setup GraphQL API in Ruby on Rails.
Setup Github actions for CI/CD pipeline.
Deploy services to Fly.io.
Lead the Frontend team in the integration of Apollo GraphQL and setup Unit Tests.

experience.title: MERN Stack Developer
experience.description: Developer of the Research Web Platform of the University of Havana using MERN Stack, Electron and Docker
details: Used ReactJs, Server Side rendering with Next.js and Typescript.
Using MongoDB, ExpressJs and Apollo Server for backend.
Using Apollo Graphql and Apollo CLI for API communication.
Using React I18Next for internationalization and locale.
Behavior Driven Development Approach using Jest, Enzyme and SuperTest.
Using Electron react for desktop app generation.
Local deployment using Docker and Docker-Compose.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Full stack web developer in an indian startup called Profito that allows user to keep track of income and outcome from their integrated platforms accounts as Google Ads, Shopify, Click Funnels etc.
details: Develop frontend using ReactJs, Typescript, Apollo Graphql and React Rainbow Library.
Backend using Golang libraries as chi-router, jwt, go-graphql.
Develop user authentication system from scratch using mix of browser local storage and browser cookies for store the signature of the JSON Web Token.
Develop integration mechanism for the balance platforms using OAuth protocol.
Deployment using Docker and Docker-Compose.

experience.title: React Developer
experience.description: Develop an Administration Backoffice using a custom ReactJs Template.
details: Develop administration panel using Admin Dashboard Pro React premium template from creative-tim.com.
Use Typescript as main development programming language.
Use and creation of React Hooks.
Use restful-react for API communication.
Deploy using Ngnix and Docker

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Web Application Developer for a tourist services promotion company in Cuba.
details: Develop web guides for Cuban turist services using Ruby on Rails.
Develop a Ruby on Rails multisite manager using Flask and Docker allowing the company reduce hosting costs and easy to deploy/manage websites.

blockchain-developer-researcher.summary: Full Stack Blockchain Developer and Consultant with more than 4 years of experience in Blockchain world. Bachelor thesis in Design of a new consensus algorithm for private and public blockchains. Experience using Bitcoin Core RPCs, light nodes and full nodes. Ethereum Solidity essentials. Hyperledger Fabric Ecosystem and Chaincode programming using Golang and Typescript. Strong background in Asymmetric Cryptography and Elliptic Curves. Signature and Mining algorithms. My main goal is to work in a Company where I can be a part of the decision-making process and grow as a strong professional. Iâ€™m pro Test-Driven Development and Table Work. I hate to waste time.

details: Develop PoC for Security Tokens integration with DEXs like Uniswap.
Design of Meta-Transaction solution for gasless interactions for non-blockchain users.
Support Frontend team in DApp development.
Created question's set and conducted recruitment process for onboarding new blockchain developers to the company.
Detect and fix critical bugs in the core platform.

experience.title: Hyperledger Fabric Engineer (Golang)
experience.description: Mainly as architect of the chaincode development and the security of the platform
details: Improve the project structure of the Hyperledger Fabric Chaincodes and setup testing suite using state of the art tools.
Design of the security mechanism for the users signature.
Improve over the legacy codebase with more eficient data structures.

experience.title: Blockchain Researcher and Developer
experience.description: Worked mainly as Blockchain Developer in several projects designed by the University of Havana with the objective of making improvements in the cuban economic system. Research about Blockchain common Use Cases and Applications.
details: Create and test chaincode for a Supply Chain using Hyperledger Fabric and Golang.
Work directly in seminars provided by the University with the objective of divulgate Blockchain venefits for the Economy.
Attended to Masters courses of "Introduction to Blockchain" and "Advanced Blockchain Topics" from foreign universities.
Lecturer in the University of Havana course "Intoduction to Blockchain".

experience.title: Blockchain Developer
experience.description: Worked mainly as Blockchain Developer and Consultant. Low level Bitcoin, Litecoin Developer.
details: Create paper about different transaction sizes of the most common cryptocurrencies by the time.
Tested and create report of using Bitcoin RPC Api in a Litecoin light node for the creation of a Soft Wallet.
Implementation from scratch of the Bitcoin Transaction Generation and Signing algorithm for a Hard Wallet using and supporing Legacy and SegWit addresses.

experience.title: Undergraduate Blockchain Researcher
experience.description: Research on the problems presented by blockchain technologies at the time. Theoretical contributions made for future development taking into account these problems.
details: Research and classification of public and private blockchains problems.
Developed a theoretial consensus algorithm that solved all the analyzed problems for both public and private blockchain use cases.
Maximum grade obtained in the degree thesis.
